name: Dynamic Female MODESTY conditional idles PC
author: edits Kahvipannu84 - Based on Gunslicers and vanilla animations
description:
Variants:

+ in the beginning of Submods name indicates it has VARIANTS to choose from.
Found under "Replacement animations" drop down menu.
Remember to save SUBMOD configs to save changes.

To preview variant animation, you need to have character selected with console.

Conditions customization:

You can edit and add conditions under the "Condition presets" drop down menu.
Remember to save MOD config to save changes to PRESETS.

Generic info:

Main slots:

Body:
32 = Body

Bottoms:
52 = ModPelvisSecondary
49 = ModPelvisPrimary

For more detailed info on slots, and keywords check articles at the mod page.
